A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I get the criticism for this film and I have a problem with its over use of comedy which diluted a number of its dramatic scenes. There were also some sequences which didn't work or felt unnecessary. However there was more about this that I likes than didn't especially the dynamic between Ray and Kilo. How this film sits I the trilogy we'll have to see with episode nine but7 it will be interesting with things which seemed to be setup in the Force Awakens just brushed aside.
